author: stefan2
msg: Revert r1294283 and replace it with a firmer handling of overflow conditions.
Chose cache sizes and limits such that neither item size nor entry count may
overflow. Also, add extensive commentary on these limits.
(MAX_ITEM_SIZE): Introduce this as a formal definition
(entry_t): Revert item size to uint32 (saves 8 bytes in index entry).
commentary on potential index overflow (already handled)

author: gadams
msg: ensure checkstyle-5.1 remains error free after recent changes for checkstyle-5.5 rules
